title: vaDivEl murugA
sahitya:
vaDivEl murugA varuvAi (kumarA) inba vAzhvin varattai vagaiyAi taruvAi


anupallavi

  nidhi sEr vinaigaL nIkki (endan) tandAl jnAna mEnmai koDukka viraindE varuvAi


caraNam    deivasEnai ilanga vaLLi dEvi kurattiyin  tiruvuDan tulanga
uyyum vazhiyai aruLi (endan) kandA kUrvE pOkka uDanE varuvAi
